summary: Implements a mock representation of an AWS Simple Workflow Service (SWF) workflow execution, handling its lifecycle, event history, decision processing, activity and timer tasks, and state transitions such as start, completion, failure, and cancellation.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and simulate SWF workflow behavior locally by providing a fully functional inâ€‘memory model of workflow executions, decisions, and related resources without contacting the real AWS service.
